::FZ::

FZ nods, recieving a message from Zardus.

"Allright. Is the DNA ready to be scanned by pod scanners?"

He frowns, looking the prototypes over once more. "These are organic,
correct? They have no technological parts to them?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk watched FZ move like a rabbit watches a wolf. She didn't
trust any > of the Alliance, especially thier leader. "The prototypes
are unpredictable > and instinctive to follow thier own ways, it
would be to risky to send them > into battle." she knew how savage
and untame her creations were, if they > were loose they'd probably
attack anything that moved thinking they were > protecting
themselves. "But if you used the DNA scanners from a stasis pod
> to add the strengths of my creations to your warriors you'd have a
VERY > powerfull warrior."
